titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties love to London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Best, at the sign of the Three Crowns in Giltspur-street,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "My dearest city, and my native place,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
